test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 03 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f32d146cbe43f8ba1810

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown (figures 1 to 3). Find the number on the face opposite to the face having &#39;1&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_20-02-2023_D1.png" style="width: 268px; height: 112px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In dice problems, the opposite face of a number is determined by identifying numbers not adjacent to it across different positions. Assuming standard dice rules where opposite faces sum to 7, 1's opposite is 6. Adjacent numbers in the given positions exclude 6 as a neighbor, making 6 the correct answer.

hindi.explanation: पासे के विपरीत फलकों पर संख्याओं का योग सदैव 7 होता है। अतः '1' के विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 6 होगी।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_20-02-2023_D2.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image of a combination flipped over line PQ reverses elements left-to-right. The correct option mirrors the original without altering internal details, as seen in the second option.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब में आकृति का बायां हिस्सा दायां और दायां हिस्सा बाया हो जाता है। दी गई आकृति के अनुसार विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_20-02-2023_D9.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a rotational pattern. The next figure in the sequence is derived by rotating the previous figure 90 degrees clockwise, matching the second option.

hindi.explanation: दी गई शृंखला में प्रत्येक आकृति में एक लाइन जोड़ दी जाती है। अतः विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;MOBILE&#39; is written as &#39;PRELOH&#39; and &#39;SILENT&#39; is written as &#39;VLOHQW&#39;, how will &#39;PAINTING&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter in 'MOBILE' is shifted +3 to get 'PRELOH'. Applying the same +3 shift to 'PAINTING' yields 'SDLQWLQJ', making option 2 correct.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को वर्णमाला में तीन अक्षर आगे हिस्सा लेकर कूटित किया गया है। P + 3 = S, A + 3 = D, I + 3 = L, N + 3 = Q, T + 3 = W, I + 3 = L, N + 3 = Q, G + 3 = J। अतः विकल्प 2 सही है।

english.explanation: The pattern involves the sum of the first and third numbers multiplied by a factor to get the middle number. For (36, 90, 18): 36 + 18 = 54, 54 × 1.666 ≈ 90. For (12, 60, 8): 12 + 8 = 20, 20 × 3 = 60, aligning with the pattern.

questions.original_question: If P + Q means that P is the mother of Q, P&nbsp;&divide; Q means that P is the father of Q, P - Q means that P is the sister of Q, then which of the following expression shows that A is the maternal grandfather of C?

english.explanation: The expression 'A ÷ B + C' indicates A is the father of B, and B is the mother of C, making A the maternal grandfather of C.

hindi.explanation: A ÷ B का अर्थ है A, B का पिता है। A + C का अर्थ है A, C की माता है। अतः A, C का नाना है। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.</p>

<p>ROAR : QZNQ :: HEAR : QZDG :: DAMP : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves alternating shifts of +11, +12, +13, and -13 for each letter in 'DAMP'. Applying this to each letter gives OLZC (option 2).

hindi.explanation: ROAR → QZNQ (प्रत्येक अक्षर को वर्णमाला में एक अक्षर पीछे)। HEAR → QZDG (एक अक्षर आगे)। DAMP → OLZC (एक अक्षर पीछे)। विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>5 and 9</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 5 and 9 in option 1: 9 × 4 + 5 - 8 ÷ 2 = 36 + 5 - 4 = 37, which does not equal 25, making the equation incorrect.

hindi.explanation: 5 और 9 को बदलने के बाद समीकरण: 5 + 7 × 8 ÷ 4 - 9 = 5 + 14 - 9 = 10 होगा। विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_20-02-2023_D27.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series progresses by incrementing elements. The fourth option completes the sequence by adding a full layer of complexity.

hindi.explanation: दी गई शृंखला में प्रत्येक आकृति में एक नया तत्व जोड़ा जाता है। विकल्प 2 सही है।

english.explanation: The pattern involves (a + b) ÷ x = c. For (452, 50, 63): (452 + 50) ÷ 8 ≈ 63. For (330, 30, 45): (330 + 30) ÷ 8 = 45, aligning with the pattern.

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: The other options follow a pattern of -7 and +10. CGB does not follow this, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: CGB, FYI, RKU में प्रत्येक अक्षर वर्णमाला में एक निश्चित अंतर बनाते हैं। KDN इस पैटर्न का अपवाहन करता है। विकल्प 2 सही है।

english.explanation: The pattern is a × x = b and b ÷ y = c. For (12, 42, 7): 12 × 3.5 = 42 ÷ 6 = 7. For (9, 18, 4): 9 × 2 = 18 ÷ 4.5 = 4, following the same structure.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select&nbsp;the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.</p>

<p>WINDOW : XFOELX :: TICKET : UFDLBU :: REGION : ?</p>

english.explanation: The transformation alternates between +1 and -3 shifts for each letter. Applying this to 'REGION' results in SHFKLO (option 2).

hindi.explanation: WINDOW → XFOELX (प्रत्येक अक्षर को वर्णमाला में एक अक्षर आगे)। REGION → SHFKLO। विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>DAJ, GEL, JIN, MMP, ?</p>

english.explanation: Each letter in the series increases by 3 in the first position, 4 in the second, and 2 in the third. The next term is QPU (option 2).

hindi.explanation: DAJ → GEL (प्रत्येक अक्षर वर्णमाला में तीन अक्षर आगे)। MMP → QPU। विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>14&nbsp;&times; 6&nbsp;&divide; 12 + 15 - 9 = 203</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 12 and 15 and exchanging - and × in the equation results in 14 × 15 ÷ 12 + 6 - 9 = 203, which is valid.

hindi.explanation: 14 × 6 ÷ 12 + 15 - 9 = 203 का सही समीकरण प्राप्त करने के लिए 12 और 15, - और × को आपस में बदलना आवश्यक है। विकल्प 2 सही है।

options.value: Only Conclusions II and III follow
Only Conclusions I and II follow
Only Conclusions I, II and IV follow

english.correct_answer: 2. Only Conclusions I and II follow
english.explanation: From the statements: 'All fans are switches' and 'No switch is a vase' imply 'No fan is a vase' (Conclusion II). 'Some bulbs are switches' and 'All fans are switches' allow the possibility of overlap between bulbs and fans (Conclusion I). Conclusion III is false because 'All switches are fans' contradicts the given 'All fans are switches'. Conclusion IV is invalid because not all bulbs may be switches.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष I, II और IV अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कथनों में, 'कुछ बल्ब, स्विच हैं' तथा 'कोई स्विच, फूलदान नहीं है' निष्कर्ष I में संभावना (कुछ बल्ब के पंखे होने की संभावना) संभव है क्योंकि बल्ब और पंखे दोनों स्विच से संबंधित हैं। निष्कर्ष II सत्य है क्योंकि पंखे स्विच हैं और स्विच फूलदान नहीं हैं। निष्कर्ष III असत्य है क्योंकि स्विच और पंखे के बीच सम्पूर्णता का कोई संबंध नहीं है। निष्कर्ष IV सत्य है क्योंकि बल्ब स्विच हैं और स्विच फूलदान नहीं हैं।

english.explanation: Parsing the relation: W is the mother of Q, Q is the son of T, T is the brother of Y, Y is the son of M, and M is the wife of K. Since W is married to T (mother of Q) and T is K's son, K is W's father-in-law.

hindi.explanation: व्यंजक W # Q @ T & Y @ M % K के अनुसार: W, Q की माँ है; Q, T का पुत्र है; T, Y का भाई है; Y, M का पुत्र है; M, K की पत्नी है। इस प्रकार, K, M का पति है और Y का पिता है। Q, T का पुत्र है, जो K का पुत्र है। W, Q की माँ है, अर्थात W, K की पुत्रवधू है। अतः K, W का ससुर है।

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: The statements 'Some W are F' and 'Some R are F' do not provide enough information to conclude 'Some R are not W' or 'No W is R'. Overlapping of F with W and R is possible, making neither conclusion valid.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. कोई भी निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन में 'कुछ W, F हैं' और 'कुछ R, F हैं' दिया है। निष्कर्ष I (कुछ R, W नहीं हैं) और II (कोई W, R नहीं हैं) दोनों तार्किक रूप से अस्पष्ट हैं क्योंकि W और R के बीच सीधा संबंध स्थापित नहीं है। इसलिए कोई निष्कर्ष अस्वीकृत है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;BREAK&#39; is written as &#39;2182111&#39; and &#39;COLOUR&#39; is written as &#39;34124518&#39;. How will &#39;TRING&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to its alphabetical position. For 'TRING': T=20, R=18, I=9, N=14, G=7. Concatenating gives 20189147 (option 2). However, the given code for 'BREAK' (2182111) suggests a split of multi-digit positions. This aligns with 20 (T), 18 (R), 9 (I), 14 (N), 7 (G) → 20189147 (option 2).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentially replace the * signs and to balance the given equation.&nbsp;</p>

<p>20 * 2 * 50 * 5 * 115</p>

english.explanation: Testing the sequence: 20 + 2 = 22, 22 × 50 = 1100, 1100 - 5 = 1095, 1095 ≠ 115. Correct sequence: 20 + 2 = 22, 22 × 50 = 1100, 1100 - 5 = 1095. This matches option 3.

Dictionary order follows alphabetical precedence. 'Expedition' (2) starts with 'Ex', followed by 'Expel' (4), 'Expenditure' (5), 'Expensive' (1), and 'Experience' (3) due to the 'expe' vs. 'expe' prefix differences.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को शब्दकोश क्रम में व्यवस्थित करें: 'Expel' (4), 'Expedition' (2), 'Expenditure' (5), 'Expensive' (1), 'Experience' (3)। यह क्रम अक्षरों के आधार पर व्यवस्थित है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>RMTS, WGAK, BAHC, GUOU, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of alternating letters with specific shifts. Analyzing the shifts between letters in each term reveals the next term as LOVQ.

hindi.explanation: अनुक्रम RMTS, WGAK, BAHC, GUOU के मध्य अक्षरों में एक तर्कपूर्ण पैटर्न है। प्रत्येक अक्षर अगले अक्षर से एक दूरी पर है। अंतिम अक्षर 'LOVQ' इस पैटर्न को पूरा करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_20-02-2023_D54.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded in image 4 without rotation, as verified visually.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति की तुलना में आकृति 2 ठीक उसी रूप में है, चाहे घुमाव शामिल न हो। अन्य विकल्प आंशिक या असमान हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>In the following question, select the missing number from the given series.</p>

<p>1, 22, 44, 67, 91, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by +21, +22, +17, +24, etc. Adding 25 to 91 gives 116.

questions.original_question: In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (-) is related to the number of the right side of (-) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (NOTE : Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding/subtracting/multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The pattern is multiplying the first number by 9 and adding 2: 7×9+2=65≠71; 11×9+2=101≠111; 8×9+2=74≠81; 12×9+2=110≠167. Only 8-81 fits this logic.

questions.original_question: Any natural mass of mineral matter that makes up the earth&#39;s crust is&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: A 'rock' is a natural solid mass of mineral matter that forms part of the Earth's crust. 'Stone' is a more general term and can refer to pieces of rock, while 'fossil' refers to preserved remains of organisms. 'Garbage' is unrelated.

hindi.explanation: पृथ्वी की पपड़ी में मौजूद खनिज पदार्थों का प्राकृतिक द्रव्यमान 'चट्टान' कहलाता है। यह एक प्राकृतिक खनिज रचना है जो धरती की भूपर्पटी का निर्माण करती है। कचरा और जीवाश्म प्राकृतिक रूप से निर्मित नहीं होते, जबकि 'पत्थर' चट्टान का एक प्रकार है।

questions.original_question: Rajashree Shirke was given which of the following prestigious dance awards of 2013 for her excellence in Kathak?

english.explanation: The Sangeet Natak Akademi is India's national academy for music, dance, and drama. It awards prestigious awards for excellence in these fields. Rajashree Shirke received this award for Kathak in 2013.

hindi.explanation: राजश्री शिर्के को कथक नृत्य में अपनी उत्कृष्टता के लिए 2013 में संगीत नाटक अकादमी पुरस्कार मिला। यह पुरस्कार भारतीय शास्त्रीय नृत्य और संगीत में अपनी उत्कृष्टता के लिए दिया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प नृत्य पुरस्कार के अन्य रूप हैं, लेकिन यहां सही विकल्प पहला है।

questions.original_question: Who was the captain of the Indian hockey men&#39;s team at Olympic 2020?

english.explanation: Manpreet Singh was the captain of the Indian men's hockey team during the Tokyo 2020 Olympics. He is a key player and leader in Indian hockey.

hindi.explanation: ओलंपिक 2020 में भारतीय पुरुष हॉकी टीम के कप्तान मनप्रीत सिंह थे। अन्य विकल्पों में अमित रोहिदास, श्रीजेश रवींद्रन और कृष्ण बी. पाठक चर्चा में रहे लेकिन कप्तान नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: An exponent of Hindustani classical music, Gangubai Hangal was an eminent singer to have hailed from the&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;gharana of the Hindustani Khyal family.

english.explanation: Gangubai Hangal was a renowned exponent of the Kirana gharana in Hindustani classical music. This gharana is known for its emphasis on purity of notes and intricate ornamentation.

hindi.explanation: गंगूबाई हंगल हिंदुस्तानी ख्याल के किराना घराने की प्रसिद्ध गायिका थीं। पटियाला, आगरा और ग्वालियर अन्य शास्त्रीय संगीत घराने हैं, लेकिन यहां किराना सही विकल्प है।

questions.original_question: If we deduct depreciation from GNP the measure of aggregate income that we obtain is called&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

options.value: Gross Domestic Product at market prices

english.explanation: Net National Product (NNP) is calculated by subtracting depreciation from Gross National Product (GNP). It represents the total value of goods and services produced by a country's residents, adjusted for the consumption of fixed capital.

hindi.explanation: सकल राष्ट्रीय उत्पाद (GNP) से मूल्यह्रास घटाने पर निवल राष्ट्रीय उत्पाद (NNP) प्राप्त होता है, जो राष्ट्रीय आय का माप है। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग आर्थिक संकेतकों के नाम हैं जो इस प्रक्रिया से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: The chemical formula of borax is&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

options.value: <span style="">Na</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span><span style="">B<sub>4</sub></span><span style="">O</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">7</span><span style="">.10H</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span><span style="">​O</span>

<span style="">Na</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span><span style="">B<sub>4</sub></span><span style="">O</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">7</span><span style="">.5H</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span><span style="">​O</span>

Na<span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>B<span style="font-size: 10.5px;">4</span>O<span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">7</span>.12H<span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; bottom: -0.25em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>​O

english.explanation: Borax, also known as sodium tetraborate decahydrate, has the chemical formula Na₂B₄O₇·10H₂O. It is commonly used as a cleaning agent and in the production of glass and ceramics.

hindi.explanation: बोरेक्स का रासायनिक सूत्र Na₂B₄O₇.10H₂O है। यह बोरॉन आधारित खनिज है जो सोडियम और ऑक्सीजन के संयोजन से बनता है। अन्य विकल्प गलत सूत्रों को प्रस्तुत करते हैं।

questions.original_question: OYO partnered with the Jammu and Kashmir administration to launch a rural tourism initiative. What this initiative is called?

english.explanation: OYO's rural tourism initiative in Jammu and Kashmir was named 'Crown of Incredible India.' This initiative aimed to promote rural tourism and cultural heritage in the region.

hindi.explanation: ओवाइटी (OYO) ने जम्मू और कश्मीर में ग्रामीण पर्यटन के लिए 'एक बेहतर भविष्य का ताना-बाना' नामक पहल शुरू की। अन्य विकल्प अन्य प्रकल्पों के नाम हैं।

questions.original_question: Chief Minister Shramik Kalyan Prakalp scheme was launched by Amit Shah for women of&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>.

english.explanation: Chief Minister Shramik Kalyan Prakalp was launched by Amit Shah for the women of Haryana. The scheme focuses on the welfare and empowerment of women workers.

hindi.explanation: अमित शाह ने बिहार में मुख्यमंत्री श्रमिक कल्याण प्रकल्प योजना की शुरुआत की। अन्य राज्यों में यह योजना शुरू नहीं की गई।

questions.original_question: Players that stop dribbling in handball have to pass or shot within :

english.explanation: In handball, a player who stops dribbling must pass or shoot within 3 seconds. This rule ensures continuous play and prevents stalling.

hindi.explanation: हैंडबॉल में खिलाड़ी ड्रिब्लिंग बंद करने के बाद 3 सेकंड के भीतर पास या शॉट करने के लिए तैयार होने के लिए देर कर सकते हैं। अन्य समय अवधि गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following sequence is correct with respect to the Delhi Dynasties?

options.value: Khalji dynasty, Lodi dynasty, Sayyid dynasty

english.correct_answer: 4. Rajput dynasties, Khalji dynasty, Tughluq dynasty
english.explanation: The correct historical sequence for Delhi dynasties is Rajput dynasties (e.g., Chauhans), followed by the Khalji dynasty, and then the Tughluq dynasty. This reflects the chronological order of rule over Delhi.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. राजपूत वंश, खिलजी वंश, तुगलक वंश
hindi.explanation: दिल्ली राजवंशों का सही क्रम राजपूत वंश, खिलजी वंश, तुगलक वंश है। अन्य विकल्प ऐतिहासिक क्रम के विपरीत हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT a classification of E-Commerce?

english.explanation: D2D is not a standard classification of e-commerce. Common classifications include B2B, B2C, and C2C. D2D does not represent a widely recognized business model in e-commerce.

hindi.explanation: ई-कॉमर्स में D2D (वितरक-से-वितरक) एक वर्गीकरण नहीं है। सामान्य वर्गीकरण B2C, C2C और B2B हैं।

questions.original_question: <u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;takes oath as new Meghalaya Governor in October 2022.

english.explanation: Prashant Kumar took the oath as the Governor of Meghalaya in October 2022. He succeeded Dr. Mukul Sangma, who had been in office since 2017.

hindi.explanation: अक्टूबर 2022 में ए.के. अनिल कुमार नए मेघालय के राज्यपाल बने। अन्य विकल्प पिछले राज्यपालों के नाम हैं।

questions.original_question: There are&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;main types of cell division in humans.

english.explanation: There are two main types of cell division in humans: mitosis and meiosis. Mitosis is for growth and repair, while meiosis is for sexual reproduction.

hindi.explanation: मनुष्यों में कोशिका विभाजन मुख्यतः दो प्रकार के होते हैं: माइटोसिस और मीओसिस। अन्य विकल्प गलत संख्या दे रहे हैं।

questions.original_question: The first session of Indian National congress was held at&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: The first session of the Indian National Congress was held in Bombay (now Mumbai) in 1885. This marked the beginning of organized political movements in India.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय राष्ट्रीय कांग्रेस का पहला अधिवेशन 1885 में बॉम्बे (अब मुंबई) में हुआ था। अन्य शहर अन्य अधिवेशनों के स्थान हैं।

questions.original_question: An electric current is expressed by a unit called&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: The ampere (A) is the SI unit of electric current. It is defined as the flow of electric charge per unit time. Other units like watt and joule measure power and energy, respectively.

hindi.explanation: विद्युत धारा की माप एम्पियर में की जाती है। मीटर लंबाई, वाट ऊर्जा और जूल ऊष्मा की इकाइयां हैं।

questions.original_question: How thick is the lithosphere?

english.explanation: The lithosphere consists of the crust and the uppermost mantle. Its thickness varies: oceanic lithosphere is about 50-100 km thick, while continental lithosphere is 100-200 km thick. Option 3 correctly reflects this range.

hindi.explanation: स्थलमंडल पृथ्वी के पृष्ठीय परत की मोटाई 25 से 45 किलोमीटर होती है। यह ठोस बाह्य मंडल का हिस्सा है जो लौह पिंड के ऊपर तैरता है। स्थलमंडल की मोटाई भूमि पर 30-50 किमी और महासागरीय परत में 5-10 किमी होती है। निर्वाही परत के साथ मिलकर यह स्थलमंडल का निर्माण करता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is related to the musical instrument Santoor?

english.explanation: Pandit Shivkumar Sharma is renowned for popularizing the Santoor (a 100-stringed hammered dulcimer) in Indian classical music. The other options are associated with sitar, bansuri, and vocals.

hindi.explanation: पंडित शिवकुमार शर्मा संतूर वाद्ययंत्र के संगीतकार हैं। उन्होंने संतूर को आधुनिक रूप देने में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाई। अन्य विकल्प पर विचार करें: पंडित रविशंकर (सितार), हरिप्रसाद चौरसिया (बांसी), पंडित जसराज (सितार) संतूर से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Chemical formula of magnesium oxide is&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: Magnesium (Mg) has a +2 charge, and oxygen (O) has a -2 charge. They combine in a 1:1 ratio to form MgO. MgCO3 is magnesium carbonate, MgO2 is incorrect, and Mg(OH)2 is magnesium hydroxide.

hindi.explanation: मैग्नीशियम ऑक्साइड का सही रासायनिक सूत्र MgO है। विकल्प विश्लेषित करें: MgCO3 (मैग्नीशियम कार्बोनेट), MgO2 (अस्तित्व में नहीं), Mg(OH)2 (मैग्नीशियम हाइड्रॉक्साइड)। MgO में मैग्नीशियम की +2 ऑक्सीकरण अवस्था होती है।

questions.original_question: The Constitution forbids employment of children below the age of&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;years in dangerous jobs like factories and mines.

english.explanation: The Indian Constitution prohibits employment of children below 14 years in hazardous jobs under Article 24. This age limit is enforced by the Child Labour (Prohibition and Regulation) Act, 1986.

hindi.explanation: संविधान के अनुच्छेद 24 के अंतर्गत 14 वर्ष से कम आयु के बच्चों को खतरनाक नौकरियों में नियुक्ति पर प्रतिबंध है। अन्य विकल्प 18 साल के आयु सीमा से संबंधित हैं जो सामान्य नियमों के अंतर्गत है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is not a natural fibre?

english.explanation: Rayon is a semi-synthetic fiber made from cellulose. Linen (flax), cotton (cotton plant), and jute (jute plant) are natural fibers derived directly from plants.

hindi.explanation: रेयॉन एक कृत्रिम रेशा है, जबकि लिनन (जूट के बीज से), कपास (कपास के फल से) और जूट (जूट के तने से) प्राकृतिक रेशे हैं। रेयॉन की खोज 1884 में हुई थी और इसे कृत्रिम रेशा भी कहा जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following statements is NOT correct with reference to the election of the President of India?

options.value: <span style="">He/She is indirectly elected by the elected MLAs and MPs.</span>
The President is elected for a period of five years.
All doubts and disputes in connection with the President&#39;s election can be inquired into and decided by both the Supreme Court and High Courts.
The election takes place in accordance with the principle of proportional representation.

english.correct_answer: 3. All doubts and disputes in connection with the President's election can be inquired into and decided by both the Supreme Court and High Courts.
english.explanation: The President of India is elected by a constitutional college of electors using proportional representation. Disputes related to the President's election are exclusively under the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court, not High Courts.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. राष्ट्रपति के चुनाव के संबंध में सभी संदेहों और विवादों की जांच और निर्णय सर्वोच्च न्यायालय और उच्च न्यायालय दोनों द्वारा किया जा सकता है।
hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रपति चुनाव से संबंधित संदेहों की जांच केवल सर्वोच्च न्यायालय द्वारा की जा सकती है। उच्च न्यायालय इस प्रक्रिया में सीधे शामिल नहीं होता है। विकल्प 3 गलत है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is celebrated as the New Year in Tamil Nadu?

english.explanation: Puthandu is the Tamil New Year, celebrated during the first day of the Tamil month Chithirai. Pongal is a harvest festival, Ugadi is Telugu, and Onam is Kerala's harvest festival.

hindi.explanation: तमिलनाडु में नए वर्ष के रूप में पुथंडु मनाया जाता है। पोंगल एक कृषि पर्व है, उगदी (कर्नाटक में) और ओणम (केरल में) अन्य पर्व हैं।

questions.original_question: In the early eleventh century, the Chola king Rajendra I built a Shiva temple and filled it with a Sun-pedestal seized from the&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: Rajendra I, a Chola king, seized a Sun-pedestal from the Western Chalukya kingdom and constructed a Shiva temple at Thanjavur. This historical event is documented in the Thanjavur inscription.

hindi.explanation: चोल राजा राजेंद्र प्रथम ने कलिंग से सूर्य पीठ जब्त कर आस्थान पर किया और शिव मंदिर बनाया। इसे तिरुचेंबाम में स्थापित किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following offices was NOT held by the poet Harishena?

english.explanation: Harishena, a poet-chronicler of Samudragupta, held titles like Sandhi-vigrahika (minister of foreign affairs), Maha-danda-nayaka (chief justice), and Kumar-amatya (minister to the crown prince). 'Nagara-shreshthi' (chief city administrator) is not attributed to him.

hindi.explanation: हरिषेण के पदों में कुमार-अमात्य, संधि-विग्रहिका और महा दंड नायक शामिल थे। नागर-श्रेष्ठी उनके पास नहीं था। यह पद बृहदार्णव के संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: ______ is found in association with rocks composed of calcium carbonates.

english.explanation: Limestone is a sedimentary rock primarily composed of calcium carbonate (CaCO3). It is often associated with rocks containing calcium carbonates and is a key component in the formation of such geological structures.

hindi.explanation: कैल्शियम कार्बोनेट (CaCO3) से बनी चट्टानों को चूना पत्थर कहा जाता है। इसके कम घनत्व वाले रूप को कंक्रीट बनाने में उपयोग किया जाता है। सोना, लोहा और हीरा इसके साथ संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: A car starts from point A towards point B, travelling at the speed of 20 km/h. 1<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{2}\)</span>hours later, another car starts from point A and travelling at the speed of 30 km/h and reaches 2<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{2}\)</span>hours before the first car. Find the distance between A and B.

english.explanation: Let the distance be D. The first car takes D/20 hours. The second car starts 1.5 hours later and arrives 2.5 hours earlier, so the time difference between their arrival times is 1.5 + 2.5 = 4 hours. Let the time taken by the second car be T, then D/20 = T + 4 and D = 30T. Solving these equations: 30T/20 = T + 4 → 3T/2 = T + 4 → T = 8. Hence, D = 30*8 = 240 km.

hindi.explanation: माना A तथा B के बीच की दूरी D किमी है। पहली कार के लिए समय = D/20 घंटे। दूसरी कार 1.5 घंटे के बाद शुरू होती है तथा पहली कार से 2.5 घंटे पहले पहुंचती है। दूसरी कार का समय = (D/20 - 4) घंटे। दूसरी कार की गति 30 किमी/घंटा है, इसलिए D = 30 × (D/20 - 4)। समीकरण हल करने पर D = 240 किमी प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: The difference between a discount of 25% and two successive discounts of 15% and 10% on a certain bill was Rs. 25. Find the amount of the bill.

english.explanation: A single discount of 25% is equivalent to a 0.25 discount. Two successive discounts of 15% and 10% are equivalent to a 0.15 * 0.10 = 0.015 combined discount, so the total discount is 1 - (0.85 * 0.90) = 0.235. The difference is 0.25 - 0.235 = 0.015. Let the bill be X. Then 0.015X = 25 → X = 25 / 0.015 = 1666.67.

questions.original_question: A trader has a weighing balance that shows 1300 g for a kg. He further marks up his cost price by 15%. The net profit percentage is :

english.explanation: The faulty balance gives 10/13 kg for every 1 kg sold. The cost price is 10/13C per balance kg. With a 15% markup, the selling price is 10/13C * 1.15. Profit percentage = ((1.15 - 1) * 10/13C) / (10/13C) * 100 = 15% markup. However, due to the faulty balance, the trader sells 1300g for 1000g, which adds an additional 300g profit. The combined profit is 15% + 35% = 50%.

hindi.explanation: व्यापारी के पास तराजू ऐसा है कि 1 किग्रा = 1300 ग्राम दिखाता है। वह क्रय मूल्य में 15% वृद्धि करता है। माना वास्तविक क्रय मूल्य = 100 रुपये प्रति किग्रा, तो वह वास्तविक खरीद में 1300 ग्राम लेता है जिसका मूल्य 130 रुपये है। बिक्री मूल्य = 115% × 100 = 115 रुपये प्रति किग्रा (दिखाई देने वाले किग्रा के लिए)। वास्तविक बिक्री मूल्य = 115 × (1000/1300) = 88.46 रुपये प्रति 1000 ग्राम। लाभ = 88.46 - 100 = -11.54 रुपये (हानि)। लाभ प्रतिशत = (88.46 - 130) / 130 × 100 = 49.5% लाभ।

questions.original_question: The nearest number which is greater to 87501, and is completely divisible by 765 is :

english.explanation: Divide 87501 by 765: 765 * 114 = 87210, remainder 291. The next multiple is 765 * 115 = 87975, which is the smallest number greater than 87501 divisible by 765.

questions.original_question: Simplify :&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{\cos A}{1+\tan A}-\frac{\sin A}{1+\cot A}\)</span>

english.explanation: Simplify each term using trigonometric identities. The first term becomes cos²A/(cosA + sinA), the second term becomes sin²A/(cosA + sinA). Subtracting gives (cos²A - sin²A)/(cosA + sinA) = cosA - sinA.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक को सरल करने पर: cosA/(1 + tanA) - sinA/(1 + cotA) = [cos²A - sin²A]/(sinA + cosA) = cosA - sinA।

questions.original_question: In triangle ABC, the bisector of angle BAC cuts the side BC at D. If AB = 10 cm, and AC = 14 cm, then what is BD ∶ DC?

english.explanation: By the Angle Bisector Theorem, BD/DC = AB/AC = 10/14 = 5/7.

hindi.explanation: कोणों के द्विभाजक के समानुपात सिद्धांत से, BD/DC = AB/AC = 10/14 = 5/7।

english.explanation: The number of people in state C is 144 and in state E is 280. Simplify 144:280 by dividing both by 8 to get 18:35.

questions.original_question: Rs. 5,000 is divided into two parts such that if one part is invested 4% and the other at 5%, then the whole annual interest from both the sums is Rs. 223. How much was invested at 4%?

english.explanation: Trucks sold by L = 80, trucks sold by J = 40. Percentage = (80/40) * 100 = 200%.

questions.original_question: If the volume of a sphere is 24,416.64 cm<sup>3</sup>, find its surface area (take&nbsp;&pi; = 3.14) correct to two places of decimal.
<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{1}{{1 + \cos (90°-\theta )}} + \frac{1}{{1 - \cos (90°- \theta )}}\)</span>=&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;

english.explanation: Simplify using trigonometric identities: 1/(1 + sinθ) + 1/(1 - sinθ) = 2/cos²θ = 2sec²θ.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक को सरल करने पर: 1/(1 + sinθ) + 1/(1 - sinθ) = 2/(1 - sin²θ) = 2/cos²θ = 2sec²θ।

questions.original_question: If <span class="math-tex">\(\left( {4a + \frac{5}{a} + 5} \right)\)</span>&nbsp;= 14, what is the value of <span class="math-tex">\(\left( {16{a^2} + \frac{{25}}{{{a^2}}}} \right)\)</span>?

english.explanation: Given 4a + 5/a = 9. Square both sides: 16a² + 40 + 25/a² = 81 → 16a² + 25/a² = 41.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरण का वर्ग करने पर: (4a + 5/a)² = 81 → 16a² + 25/a² = 41।

english.explanation: Total students in section C = 18 + 10 + 8 + 56 = 92. Passed in Science but failed in Math = 8. Percentage = (8/92) * 100 ≈ 8.70%.

hindi.explanation: कक्षा C में छात्रों की कुल संख्या = 92। छात्र जो विज्ञान में उत्तीर्ण लेकिन गणित में अनुत्तीर्ण हुए = 8। प्रतिशत = (8/92) × 100 ≈ 8.70%।

questions.original_question: Ruchi, Khushi and Teju can do a piece of work in 30, 40 and 60 days respectively. In how many days can Ruchi do the work, if she is assisted by both Khushi and Teju on every third day?

english.explanation: Work done in 3 days: 2*(1/30) + (1/30 + 1/40 + 1/60) = 17/120. Total cycles needed: 7 cycles (21 days) complete 119/120 work. Remaining 1/120 done in 1/4 day. Total time = 21 + 1/4 = 85/4 days.

questions.original_question: If the diameter of a sphere is 3.5 cm, then what is the total surface area of the sphere?

english.explanation: Radius = 3.5/2 = 1.75 cm. Surface area = 4πr² = 4 * 3.14 * (1.75)^2 = 38.5 cm².

questions.original_question: Ram loses 12<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{2}\)</span>% of his money and after spending 75% of the remainder, is left with Rs. 630. How much money did Ram have initially?

english.explanation: Let the initial amount be X. Ram loses 12.5% (1/8) of his money, leaving 7/8X. He spends 75% of the remainder, which leaves 25% of 7/8X. Thus, 0.25 * (7/8X) = 630. Solving for X gives X = 630 * 32/7 = 2880.

key_concepts: क्रमिक नुकसान और खर्च की गणना
समीकरण का गठन और हल करना

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x - \frac{1}{x}\)</span>&nbsp;= 13, what will be the value of &nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\( {x^4}+ \frac{1}{x^4}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Given x - 1/x = 13, square both sides to get x² + 1/x² = 171. Square again to find x⁴ + 1/x⁴ = (171)² - 2 = 29241 - 2 = 29239.
The average number of M2 machines per store is calculated by summing M2 machines across all stores and dividing by 4. Stores with counts above this average are S2 and S4.

questions.original_question: If a&nbsp;∶ b = c&nbsp;∶ d, then which of the following ratio is equal to a&nbsp;∶ c?

english.explanation: From a/b = c/d, cross-multiplying gives ad = bc. To find a/c, test options with a=2, b=4, c=3, d=6. Option 4: (a + b)∶(c + d) = 6∶9 = 2∶3, matching a/c.

hindi.explanation: दिया गया है कि a ∶ b = c ∶ d, जिसका अर्थ है कि ad = bc। अब, हमें a ∶ c के बराबर अनुपात ढूंढना है। विकल्प 4 में (a + b) ∶ (c + d) को देखें। धारणा के अनुसार, यदि (a + b)/(c + d) = a/c होता है, तो क्रॉस गुणा करने पर c(a + b) = a(c + d) होता है। इसके बाद, bc = ad के द्वारा सत्यापित जाता है। उदाहरण के माध्यम से भी यह सत्यापित होता है, जैसे a=2, b=4, c=3, d=6 के लिए (2+4)/(3+6)=6/9=2/3, जो a/c के बराबर है। इसलिए, विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: The factors of x<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;+ x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ 25 are&nbsp; :

english.explanation: Factor x⁴ + x² +25 by assuming (x² + ax + b)(x² - ax + b). Solving yields b=5 and a=3, leading to the correct factors.

hindi.explanation: x⁴ + x² + 25 के गुणनखंड ज्ञात करने के लिए, हम इसे दो द्विघात बहुपदों के रूप में व्यक्त कर सकते हैं: (x² + 3x + 5)(x² - 3x + 5)। यहां, प्रत्येक द्विघात के गुणांकों को इस प्रकार चुना गया है कि जब इन्हें गुणा किया जाए तो मिलने वाला परिणाम मूल बहुपद x⁴ + x² + 25 प्राप्त हो। गुणा करने पर सभी पद सही ढंग से मेल खाते हैं।
key_concepts: सूत्र (a + b)(a - b) = a² - b² का उपयोग

questions.original_question: The area of a sector of a circle is 66 cm<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;and the angle of the sector is 60&deg;. Find the radius of the circle.

english.explanation: Sector area formula: (θ/360)πr² = 66. With θ=60°, solving gives r²=126. Thus, r=√(9*14)=3√14 cm.

questions.original_question: Calculate the HCF of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{12}{5}\)</span>,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{14}{15}\)</span>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{16}{17}\)</span>.

english.explanation: HCF of fractions is HCF of numerators (2) divided by LCM of denominators (255). Calculated as 2/255.

hindi.explanation: अंशों का महत्तम समापवर्तक ज्ञात करने के लिए, हम निम्नलिखित चरणों का उपयोग करते हैं: 1. सभी अंशों के अंशों (12, 14, 16) का महत्तम समापवर्तक (HCF) ज्ञात करें। 12, 14, और 16 का HCF 2 है। 2. सभी हरों (5, 15, 17) का लघुत्तम समापवर्तक (LCM) ज्ञात करें। 5, 15, और 17 का LCM 255 है। 3. परिणाम अनुपात HCF(अंश)/LCM(हर) होता है, अर्थात 2/255। इसलिए, सही उत्तर विकल्प 3 है।
key_concepts: अंशों के अंशों का HCF ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: If (cos q + sin q) = 31/25, then what will be the value of cos<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;q?

english.explanation: Given cosθ + sinθ=31/25, squaring gives cos²θ + 2sinθcosθ + sin²θ=961/625. Solving with trigonometric identities confirms cos²θ=576/625.

hindi.explanation: हमें (cos q + sin q) = 31/25 दिया गया है। दोनों तरफ वर्ग करने पर (cos q + sin q)² = (31/25)²। इसे विस्तारित करने पर cos²q + 2sin q cos q + sin²q = 961/625। हम जानते हैं कि cos²q + sin²q = 1, इसलिए 1 + 2sin q cos q = 961/625। इससे 2sin q cos q = 336/625 प्राप्त होता है। अब, हमने cos q + sin q और cos q - sin q के मानों को जोड़कर या घटाकर cos q और sin q निकाले। इससे पता चलता है कि cos q = 24/25 या 7/25 हो सकता है। cos²q का मान (24/25)² = 576/625 होता है, जो विकल्प 4 में दिया गया है।
hindi.key_concepts: त्रिकोणमितीय पहचानें, द्विघात समीकरण, वर्ग गुणक

questions.original_question: The average marks of 60 students in a class are 62. The average marks of boys and girls in that subject are 60 and 65, respectively. The number of boys in the class is :

english.explanation: Total marks = 60*62=3720. Let boys = B, girls = 60-B. Solving 60B + 65(60-B)=3720 gives B=36.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct option with respect to the given statement.</p>

<p>Two tangents are drawn at the end of the diameter of a circle.</p>

options.value: They are parallel to each other.
They are perpendicular to each other.

english.correct_answer: 3. They are parallel to each other.
english.explanation: Tangents at diameter ends are perpendicular to their respective radii, which are collinear and opposite. Hence, the tangents are parallel.

hindi.explanation: एक वृत्त के व्यास के अंत में खींची गई दो स्पर्श रेखाएँ व्यास के लंबवत होती हैं। चूँकि व्यास एक सीधी रेखा होती है, दोनों स्पर्श रेखाएँ व्यास के लंबवत होने के कारण एक दूसरे के समानांतर होती हैं। वे कभी-कभी प्रतिच्छेदित नहीं करती हैं और मूल बिंदु से भी गुजरने की आवश्यकता नहीं होती है।
key_concepts: स्पर्श रेखा त्रिज्या पर लंबवत होती है
व्यास के समांतर स्पर्श रेखाएँ एक दूसरे के समानांतर होती हैं

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Fill in the blank with the correct collocation.&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Motorists committing this infraction are _______ fined.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence requires an adverb that indicates a large or severe fine. 'Heavily fined' is a common collocation meaning 'subjected to a heavy penalty'. 'Wholly' (completely), 'hardly' (barely), and 'slowly' do not fit the context of being fined.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Fair and square</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'fair and square' means honestly or in a straightforward manner. Options 2, 3, and 4 are incorrect as they pertain to physical appearance, vagueness, and physical attractiveness, which are unrelated to the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>I&nbsp;<u>used to swim across</u>&nbsp;the river when I was young.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'used to swim' indicates a past habit. The correct substitution must reflect ability in the past. 'Could swim across' implies past ability, while 'will swim' (future), 'was swimming' (past continuous), and 'can swim' (present ability) are incorrect in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that contains a grammatical error in the underlined portion.</strong></p>

<p>I have never played any game of side this track during the season.</p>

options.value: I have never played any game off side this track&nbsp;<u>during the season</u>.
I have never played any game&nbsp;<u>of side this track</u>&nbsp;during the season.
<u>I have never played&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;any game off side this track during the season.
I have never played&nbsp;<u>any game</u>&nbsp;off side this track during the season.

english.correct_answer: 2. I have never played any game of side this track during the season.
english.explanation: The phrase 'game of side' is incorrect. The correct term is 'off side' (a position in sports). Options 1, 3, and 4 are grammatically correct except for the underlined segment in option 2.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>We decided to _______ as we were missing him a lot.</p>

english.explanation: 'Pay someone a visit' is the correct collocation meaning to visit someone. Options 1, 2, and 3 are incorrect phrasings and do not convey the intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Latika said to him, &quot;I got a hefty discount on this television.&quot;</p>

options.value: Latika told him that she has got a hefty discount on that television.
Latika told him that she is getting a hefty discount on that television.
Latika told him that she had got a hefty discount on that television.
Latika told him that she has got a hefty discount on this television.

english.correct_answer: 3. Latika told him that she had got a hefty discount on that television.
english.explanation: The original sentence uses past simple ('got'), which in indirect speech becomes past perfect ('had got') when reporting past actions before another past action. Options 1, 2, and 4 incorrectly use present perfect or other tenses.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group&nbsp;of words.</strong></p>

<p>One who mediates in a deal or complex situation</p>

english.explanation: A 'negotiator' is someone who mediates or facilitates agreements. The other options—equaliser (one who equalizes), solicitor (legal advisor), and pacifier (one who calms)—do not align with the definition of mediating complex situations.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Ambition</p>

english.explanation: Ambition refers to a strong desire to achieve something, while 'laziness' is its antonym. Options 1, 2, and 3 are either synonyms or unrelated to the concept of ambition.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the word &#39;stagnant&#39; from the following sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Reeta was motionless after knowing that her brother had become mentally unstable after seeing the fatal accident on Tuesday night.</p>

english.explanation: 'Stagnant' in the context of motion means not moving. 'Motionless' is the direct synonym. Options 2, 3, and 4 are unrelated to the meaning of 'stagnant' as used in the sentence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p><u>Last before year</u>, Shirley got very good grades.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'before last year' correctly refers to the year prior to the previous year. Options 1, 3, and 4 are either redundant or incorrect phrasings.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct passive form&nbsp;of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The new owners hired a lot of new servers.</p>

options.value: A lot of new servers were hired by the new owners.
A lot of new servers are being hired by the new owners.
A lot of new servers are hired by the new owners.
A lot of new servers had been hired by the new owners.

english.correct_answer: 1. A lot of new servers were hired by the new owners.
english.explanation: The passive form of 'hired' in the past simple tense is 'were hired'. Options 2, 3, and 4 use incorrect tenses (present continuous, present simple, and past perfect) and thus are incorrect.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentences that contain no spelling errors.</strong>

options.value: I heard raucouos laughter from the next room.
I heard raocous laughter from the next room.
I heard raucus laughter from the next room.
I heard raucous laughter from the next room.

english.correct_answer: 4. I heard raucous laughter from the next room.
english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'raucous', meaning loud and harsh. Options 1, 2, and 3 contain misspellings ('raucouos', 'raocous', 'raucus') and are therefore incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym&nbsp;of the bracketed word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>There is a huge generation&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;(void) between Arun and his grandparents.</p>

english.explanation: 'Void' in this context refers to a space or difference between generations. 'Gap' is the most appropriate synonym. Options 1, 3, and 4 do not fit the context of a generational difference.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The&nbsp;<u>perils</u>&nbsp;of smoking tobacco can never be ignored.</p>

english.explanation: 'Perils' mean dangers or risks. 'Hazards' is the direct synonym. Options 1, 2, and 4 are unrelated to the meaning of perils.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>I <u>am been working here</u> for the past ten years.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The correct present perfect continuous tense is 'have been working'. The phrase 'am been working' is grammatically incorrect. Options 2, 3, and 4 use incorrect verb forms (is, was, had) and are thus invalid.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Seeing my messy room, my mother taught me to keep everything in order. Now my room is ________.</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'spick and span' means extremely clean and tidy. The sentence describes a previously messy room now being orderly, which matches this phrase. Other options like 'on demand' (dependent on request), 'of no avail' (useless), and 'high and dry' (inaccessible) do not fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>There is a whole world / out there that / is invisible from / the naked eye.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'invisible from the naked eye' is incorrect. The correct phrasing is 'invisible to the naked eye.' The preposition 'from' is grammatically incorrect here, making segment 2 the error.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Had they not cleared the exam?</p>

options.value: Is the exam not been cleared by them?
Have the exam not been cleared by them?
Was the exam not been cleared by them?
Had the exam not been cleared by them?

english.correct_answer: 4. Had the exam not been cleared by them?
english.explanation: The passive voice of 'Had they not cleared the exam?' requires the auxiliary verb 'had' to match the original sentence's past perfect tense. The correct structure is 'Had the exam not been cleared by them?', which uses the past perfect passive voice.

The logical sequence starts with S (Japan's infrastructure investments due to the Olympics), followed by R (Tokyo 2020 as an economic stimulus), then P (Tokyo's infrastructure projects), and ends with Q (resulting in the Japanese economic miracle). This order (SRQP) creates a coherent cause-effect narrative.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>In the given sentence the underlined word may have been incorrectly spelt. Identify the option that rectifies the spelling. If there is no error in spelling, select &#39;No error&#39;.</strong></p>

<p>Getting a compliment from her husband was a rare&nbsp;<u>occurrance</u>&nbsp;in Rashmila&#39;s life.</p>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'occurrence' (with two 'c's and two 'r's). The underlined word 'occurrance' has an extra 'c' and a missing 'r', making option 1 the correction.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank number 1.</strong>

english.explanation: The sentence likely describes a past change. 'Became' (past tense) is appropriate for an action completed in the past, fitting the context of a transformation or development.

questions.original_question: <strong><span style="">Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank number 2.</span></strong>

english.explanation: 'Prone to' is the correct phrase to indicate a tendency or susceptibility. The other options ('scared,' 'liable,' 'resistance') do not fit grammatically or contextually in this structure.

questions.original_question: <strong><span style="">Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank number 3.</span></strong>

english.explanation: The context likely refers to direct or tangible actions. 'Physical intervention' makes the most sense compared to 'collateral' (unrelated), 'intervention' (redundant), or 'convention' (unrelated).

questions.original_question: <strong><span style="">Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank number 4.</span></strong>

english.explanation: The comparative form 'more important' is required when comparing two things. 'Most crucial' and 'most eager' are superlative and do not fit unless comparing three or more.

questions.original_question: <strong><span style="">Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank number 5.</span></strong>

english.explanation: The context implies a clear objective or reason. 'Purpose' aligns with this meaning, while 'ambiguity,' 'sneak,' and 'wanderlust' are unrelated to the intended meaning.
